snippet.title: Hide and Seek with Noah Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3152370/Hide_and_Seek_with_Noah/?beta=0

Join Noah and his friends in a playful point and click adventure game of Hide and Seek! The children's game where somethings are never found again. What starts as a joyful game with Noah, quickly spirals into a suspenseful mystery when Noah vanishes without a trace. As officers and family search for him, they soon discover that Noah's disappearance is just the beginning.

A series of bizarre and unsettling events unfold as more people go missing. As you delve deeper into the mystery, you'll uncover hidden secrets and eerie clues that reveal a darker side to this seemingly innocent children's game. What is this game? Can you win the game before it’s too late? You wont be able to hide forever...

Suspenseful Gameplay: Engage in a game of hide and seek that evolves into a gripping mystery.

Eerie Mystery: Experience a captivating storyline filled with suspense and unexpected twists.

Family-Friendly Start: Begin with the light-hearted fun of finding Noah and his friends.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles and uncover hidden clues to unravel the dark secrets of this twisted game.

Atmospheric Environments: Explore beautifully crafted yet increasingly ominous settings that draw you deeper into the mystery.

Play the game where children's games were not as they seemed and every step, every clue brings you closer to hiding from it or seeking out Noah and the others...
